title: Your Soul Is Ours
description: Sebastian loves Marla and knew he needed her from the moment he saw her. He protects her, even from herself, and the shadows of her past. She is his world. Nothing else exists. Sebastian would eradicate anyone who has ever hurt her, and destroy every one of her negative thoughts, just to prove how worthy she is of love. No matter where she goes, he will find her anywhere, and in any realm.Marla is lost to the darkness of her own mind, where the echoes of self-doubt have haunted her since childhood. She wants to get the help she needs, but the government has other plans. When Sebastian is with her, the deafening noise of her inner demons fades into the background. The lingering echoes of her past persist like an unwelcome guest, tainting any hope for a perfect relationship.Despite their love, the edges of trauma taint their perfect world. Will the love Sebastian and Marla share be enough, or will they fall at the hands of their own demons?
author: Tanya  Lynn
